name: Sea To Summit Ether Light XT Extreme Sleeping Mat
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Ether Light XT Extreme Sleeping Mat
description: Sleep comfortably on your winter adventures. Packed with two layers of ThermoLite® insulation, this extra-thick sleeping mat boosts warmth while staying lightweight and packable. A matrix of dot-patterned welds and air cells act independently, like a pocket-spring mattress, to conform to your body shape for a comfortable, stable sleep.Quiet nylon face fabric is lightweight and grippy.Air Sprung Cells with double-layered ThermoLite® insulation prevent heat loss.Ultra-fresh antibacterial treatment prevents internal mold growth.Multi-functional one-way inflate valve flips over to prevent air re-entering during deflation.Includes pump sack, repair kit, and PillowLock™ for use with Aeros™ pillows.
